name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a dedicated Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 8 years of software development experience, I excel in building and maintaining scalable applications using **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Docker**. My strong background in cloud technologies, including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, complements my proficiency in CI/CD practices and version control with **Git**. I am skilled in both SQL and NoSQL databases, utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB** to enhance data management and application performance. I have a proven track record in developing microservices and implementing **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, ensuring adherence to industry best practices. My experience with container orchestration using **Kubernetes**, infrastructure as code with **Terraform** and **CloudFormation**, along with a focus on **DevOps**, monitoring, and observability, allows me to deliver high-quality software solutions consistently. I am passionate about leveraging my skills in an Agile environment to drive successful project outcomes, while also promoting security practices in alignment with **OWASP**, **OAuth2**, and **JWT** standards.
